name: Forbidden Arcanist
text:
Increase the mana cost of your spells by 2.
Whenever you spend mana to cast a spell, roll that many dice. You regain an amount of mana equal to the number of dice which roll 5 or higher. Then you lose an amount of HP and gain a number of forbidden secrets equal to the number of dice which roll 4 or less. Forbidden secrets dissipate when you recover.

You gain the Dark Discovery ability:
Cost: 1 AP, 6 forbidden secrets.
You regain 1 signature.
